name: 【﻿Ｂｒｅａｋ ｔｈｒｏｕｇｈ ｔｈｅ ｓｙｓｔｅｍ】(N8Jam)
description:
Hi... Uhm... This is my game for

N8Jam

(!!warnign! This game is very buggy cus it was rushed. Btw this is not a virus. if your windows says it's a virus ignore or decline the message idk click those things...  idk why that happens ;-;)

It's actually my first ever fully finished game!

I don't wanna say anything about it or else I might spoil the entire game.

But I'll say the main things.

The player goes on and adventure, but ends up in a computer system. He finds more people, and together they try to escape. Will they escape? Find out in "Break through the system"!

Also if you're asking how drew characters in 3 days and made a visual novel game in 5 days... I don't actually know... ;-; I had a lot of free time and motivation...

(Also, yes, i did drew everything by myself... i just didn't undertsand the question about did onlu I make the sprites or team... ;-;  I made the game all by myself... 'cus I don't want really want to work in group... I'd rather do everything by myself...)

P.s The game was rushed, so sorry for that T_T

Also if you don't like the game, I'm sorry.
